name: ValidatorRegistration
description: ValidatorRegistration. Implements managing AvN stake and fees.

eventDecorators.name: LogOwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a new Vault is deployed. Fired in updateTokenRegistry().

functionDecorators.name: depositFees
functionDecorators.description: deposit AVT fees associated with each node for each month. Anyone can deposit fees but likely will only be owner.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: number of AVT tokens to be deposited as fees.

parameterDecorators.name: node
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the node having the fees deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: month
parameterDecorators.description: the month for which the fees are being deposited.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: number of AVT tokens to be deposited as stake for a node.

parameterDecorators.name: node
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the node to associate the AVT stake with.

functionDecorators.name: drain
functionDecorators.description: Sends AVT associated with this contract to the dst address. Only owner can do this to get stake for nodes.

parameterDecorators.name: dst
parameterDecorators.description: is the destination address where the stake should be sent.

functionDecorators.name: flipIsWithdrawStake
functionDecorators.description: Switch between (not) accepting withdrawals of stake. Only owner can do this and will do so at the end of NUM_MONTHS to return stake.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawFees
functionDecorators.description: withdraw AVT fees associated with each node for each month for a particular staker.

parameterDecorators.name: _node
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the node from which fees are being withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: month
parameterDecorators.description: the month for which the fees are being withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawStake
functionDecorators.description: withdraw AVT tokens from staking. Only active after the 12 month period, manually set by owner.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: number of AVT tokens to be withdrawn from stake for a node.

parameterDecorators.name: node
parameterDecorators.description: the index of the node associated with the AVT stake with.
